channel.title: Pk point shop (PI) rep
channel.description:
I have Pk-Points in my server but i'm not sure how to make a Shop that instead of buying items for coins but for Pk-points to buy items, and says you don't have enough Pk points to buy this item.
Rep++
Regards, jAMES.

item.title: Pk point shop (PI) rep
item.dc:creator: @James-RevolutionX James-RevolutionX
item.description:
@James-RevolutionX wrote:

			if (Server.playerHandler.players[c.playerId].connectedFrom != o.lastKilled) {
				o.pkPoints = (o.pkpoints + 4);
				o.lastKilled = Server.playerHandler.players[c.playerId].connectedFrom;
			} else {
				o.sendMessage("You do not recieve pk points because you have killed " +c.playerName+ " twice in a row.");
			}
		}
	}

underneath apply dead, but then it still doesnt work
